description: Temporary Help Services Requirement. Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services. DND has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS...
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Temporary Help Services for Department of National Defense

## Reference and Solicitation

* Solicitation Number: S4561167
* Amendment Number: 4
* Reference Number: cb-152-75320492

## Tender Details

* Closing Date: February 8, 2024 01:00 PM EST
* Notice Date: February 2, 2024
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defense
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Description of Requirement

The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services. Suppliers selected through the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) have been invited to submit proposals.

## Security Requirement

The Resource(s) Minimum Security Level Required is Secret.

## Contact Information

* Contact Person: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 971-7955

## Request for Proposal (RFP) Documentation

The full tender package and supporting documentation can be accessed by following the link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30106/s4561167---rfp.pdf

**Important:** This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified for the 9.1 Materiel management Senior stream. The selected suppliers will be required to submit a proposal in accordance with the requirements specified in the RFP. Failure to provide a complete proposal may result in the proposal being rejected.​
_____\]
